- Cost estimation and progress tracking
- CLI interface and Python API

Project structure:
- wan22_video_processor/: Core package
  - config/: Configuration management
  - validators/: Input validation
  - uploaders/: File upload
  - processors/: API integration
  - utils/: Utility modules
- main.py: CLI entry point
- test_api_connection.py: API connectivity test
